import React,{useEffect} from 'react' import { Row, Col, Image, ListGroupItem, ListGroup, Button } from 'react-bootstrap' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { listProductDetails } from '../actions/productActions' import Loader from '../components/Loader' import Message from '../components/Message' import Rating from '../components/Rating' function ProductDetails({match}) { const dispatch = useDispatch(); const productDetails = useSelector(state=>state.productDetails) const {loading, error, product} = productDetails; useEffect(()=>{ dispatch(listProductDetails(match.params.id)) },[dispatch,match]) // {loading? : error? {error} : ( return ( <> {loading? : error? {error} : (
 Back

Product Details Page

{product.name}
Total Reviews: {product.numReviews}
 Price :${product.price} {product.description} Status: {product.countInStock>0? "In Stock" : "Out of stock"}
)} ) } export default ProductDetails
